UDPPORT - Static variable in class com.elite.game.client.NetworkWrapper
 
udpReceiverThread - Static variable in class com.elite.game.client.NetworkWrapper
 
UDPReceiverThread - Class in com.elite.game.client
Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously read in Datagram packets and store their data contents in the udpInQueue in NetworkWrapper where they can be accessed by whatever game state is currently active.
UDPReceiverThread() - Constructor for class com.elite.game.client.UDPReceiverThread
 
udpSenderThread - Static variable in class com.elite.game.client.NetworkWrapper
 
UDPSenderThread - Class in com.elite.game.client
Thread designed to run on the client side and continuously send to the server the byte arrays stored in the udpOutQueue in NetworkWrapper
UDPSenderThread() - Constructor for class com.elite.game.client.UDPSenderThread
 
universalCoords(int, int, int, int) - Static method in class com.elite.game.engine.CoordinateConverter
 
UP_PRESSED - Static variable in class com.elite.game.entity.Player
 
update(float) - Method in class com.elite.framework.animation.Animation
Move the animation from one frame to the next according to frameEndTimes.
